text: It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Apex Legends, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the Open Box: ASUS FX502VM-AS73 Gaming Laptop Intel Core i7 7th Gen 7700HQ (2.80 GHz) 16 GB DDR4 Memory 1 TB HDD 128 GB SSD NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3 GB GDDR5 VR Ready 15.6" Windows 10 Home 64-Bit. The trackpad is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.

An average performer. The NVIDIA GTX 1060 is good, but I expected a bit more from the build material on the Open Box: ASUS FX502VM-AS73 Gaming Laptop Intel Core i7 7th Gen 7700HQ (2.80 GHz) 16 GB DDR4 Memory 1 TB HDD 128 GB SSD NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3 GB GDDR5 VR Ready 15.6" Windows 10 Home 64-Bit. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The port selection is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Open Box: ASUS FX502VM-AS73 Gaming Laptop Intel Core i7 7th Gen 7700HQ (2.80 GHz) 16 GB DDR4 Memory 1 TB HDD 128 GB SSD NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3 GB GDDR5 VR Ready 15.6" Windows 10 Home 64-Bit!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Elden Ring and Starfield. The build quality of the Open Box: ASUS FX502VM-AS73 Gaming Laptop Intel Core i7 7th Gen 7700HQ (2.80 GHz) 16 GB DDR4 Memory 1 TB HDD 128 GB SSD NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3 GB GDDR5 VR Ready 15.6" Windows 10 Home 64-Bit is solid, and the build material is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1060 in the Open Box: ASUS FX502VM-AS73 Gaming Laptop Intel Core i7 7th Gen 7700HQ (2.80 GHz) 16 GB DDR4 Memory 1 TB HDD 128 GB SSD NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3 GB GDDR5 VR Ready 15.6" Windows 10 Home 64-Bit is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.
